long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a twitter friend who talks too much?  Still interested in his tweets, but he drowning out everyone else's voice?  TMUI ("Too Much Useuless Information") collects all of your annoying friends tweets into a single block, and hides them until you're ready.  This gives you time to sift through everyone else's tweets, and only show your annoying friend's when you're ready!
